subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Amid growing speculation that he faced losing his starting job, Jamal Crawford scored 30 points in the Knicks’ 111-110 loss to the Nets at Madison Square Garden in the final preseason game for both teams. Crawford, who made 9 of 15 shots, missed a shot with 0.9 seconds remaining that would have won the game. Both teams finished the preseason 3-4.
